Description of incident: On February 2, 2018, Eastern Shore began to receive reports from several employees that unauthorized individuals attempted to file fraudulent tax returns in their name. At this point, there is no indication that employee data was accessed without authorization on Eastern Shore's systems. However, due to the timing of the reports of fraudulent tax returns being filed, Eastern Shore is notifying its employees of the potential incident so they can take steps to protect themselves. Eastern Shore will continue to investigate the incident and remediate any issues discovered.
